## Data Processing

[Place Holder Test and R Code Here]

```{r File Processing}
download.file('https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/repdata%2Fdata%2FStormData.csv.bz2','./StormData.csv.bz2')
Raw_StormData <- read.csv("StormData.csv.bz2")
Raw_StormData <- Raw_StormData %>% mutate(EVTYPE = trimws(EVTYPE))
Raw_StormData <- Raw_StormData %>% group_by(EVTYPE)
EvTypes <- summarise(Raw_StormData)
HealthData <- Raw_StormData %>% select(STATE, EVTYPE, FATALITIES, INJURIES)
EconData <- Raw_StormData %>% select(STATE, EVTYPE, PROPDMG, PROPDMGEXP, CROPDMG, CROPDMGEXP)
```
